text: Gaston Egmond Thorn (3 September 192826 August 2007) was a Luxembourg politician. He served as the 20th Prime Minister of Luxembourg (1974–79), President of the United Nations General Assembly (1975), and the seventh President of the European Commission (1981–85). ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Luxembourg Category:European Commissioners Category:Presidents of the United Nations General Assembly
title: Gaston Thorn
